name: Wrong Way Racing Moto
description:
Do you like Wrong Way Racing? Try it with our Moto, it is too hard!

We created special type of the runner game, where you are racing with Moto, but it is way hard. It is the completely new view of the game, where traffic is coming with the high speed and all things are with the wrong way. Thats why we call it Wrong Way Racing Moto.

There is one impossible track to complete. So, you have to try hard to get the best high score.

Controls:

*Move your phone to control Moto and don't crash with cars. You have to keep balance to move moto like the pro.

*Please touch the screen to jump with the moto.
